column3: Large language models transform knowledge work across industries, with sophisticated AI assistants increasingly used for content generation, coding, and analytics.
Data entry, basic customer service, and routine analytical tasks become predominantly automated, with AI systems handling 80% of straightforward workflows.
AI trainers, ethics specialists, human-AI collaboration experts, and AI system interpreters become mainstream professions with growing demand.
Over 50% of workers use AI tools daily, with 30% working in roles that didn't exist in 2023. Human-AI collaboration becomes the standard working model.
